behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item, washing_machine:item, detergent:item):

        # Place the shirt in the washing machine

        # Close the washing machine door before starting the wash cycle

        # Turn on the washing machine to start the washing cycle

def in_basket_for_clothes(shirt:item, basket:item):
    # Function to check if a shirt is in the basket for clothes
    return inside(shirt, basket) and is_basket_for_clothes(basket)

behavior wash_the_shirt(shirt:item, washing_machine:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Place the shirt inside the washing machine
        achieve closed(washing_machine)
        # Close the washing machine door
        achieve is_on(washing_machine)
        # Start the washing machine

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and dirty(shirt)
        # Select a dirty shirt
        
        bind basket: item where:
            is_basket_for_clothes(basket) and in_basket_for_clothes(shirt, basket)
        # Locate the basket where the shirt is stored

        bind washing_machine: item where:
            is_washing_machine(washing_machine)
        # Select the washing machine

        wash_the_shirt(shirt, washing_machine)
        # Wash the shirt in the washing machine

        achieve clean(shirt) and inside(shirt, basket)
        # Ensure the shirt is clean and placed back in the basket afterward

behavior wash_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):

        achieve inside(shirt, sink)
        # Place the shirt inside the sink for washing
        if exists faucet: item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # If there is a faucet near the sink, turn it on for washing
        wash(shirt) 
        # Wash the shirt in the sink

                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # Turn off the faucet after washing

def is_clothes_shirt_dirty(shirt:item):
    # Function to check if the shirt is dirty
    symbol is_dirty=exists o: item : is_clothes_shirt(o) and dirty(o) and id[o]==id[shirt]
    return is_dirty

behavior clean_shirt(shirt:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inside(shirt, sink)
        # Ensure the shirt is placed inside the sink

        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it on to wash the shirt

        wash(shirt) # This is the key step of the behavior, used for washing the shirt

        if is_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
            # Turn off the faucet after washing

behavior __goal__():

        bind shirt: item where:
            is_clothes_shirt(shirt) and is_clothes_shirt_dirty(shirt)
        # Select a dirty shirt

        bind sink: item where:

        # Select a sink
